demoExpired.title: 演示版过期
demoExpired.canUpgrade: 感谢您试用 Sandstorm 演示版！您的演示帐号已过期。如果您想继续使用 Sandstrom 并且让您的数据被永久保留，请登录。
demoExpired.cannotUpgrade: 感谢您试用 Sandstorm 演示版！您的演示帐号已过期。

demoModal.header: 沙聚云是一个可自托管的 Web 生产力套件
demoModal.withoutAppDemo: 所有程序，一个地方就够了
demoModal.explanation: 沙聚云使您可以轻松地在自己的服务器上运行应用程序。除了改善隐私和控制之外, 这还使开源软件被更多人知晓。
demoModal.securityOverview: 沙聚云也特安全。如果您对这个领域感兴趣，可以看看 沙聚云的安全模型。

signup.title: 申请注册

signedUp.keyIsUsedWithOrigin: 注册成功！请前往下载应用程序。
signedUp.keyIsNotUsed: 您已经成功注册，不再需要该密钥。

signup.keyIsUsed: 抱歉，该注册密钥已被使用。
signup.signInGuide: 请点击右上角“登入”按钮。

uploadTest.title: 上传测试页面
uploadTest.explanation: 该页面供测试脚本使用。

isPaid.title: 当您的朋友在 Oasis 上分享时，可获得至多 30 GB 可用空间！
isPaid.explanation: 每个朋友创建一次分享链接，我们将奖励您 2 GB。

isNotPaid.title: 当您的朋友在 Oasis 上分享时，可获得无限个沙粒和至多 2 GB 可用空间！
isNotPaid.explanation: 每个朋友创建一次分享链接，我们将奖励您 50 MB。您还可以创建无限个沙粒！

howTo.title: 分享就是推广
howTo.explanation: 欲开始，打开任何沙粒并点击分享

getStart.step1: 您分享一个沙粒给您的朋友（他不是已有的 Oasis 用户）。
getStart.step3: 您的朋友分享一个沙粒给其他人（包括您）。

status.title: 您的推广 & 推广状态
status.explanation: 一旦您分享了链接出去，其他人登录后会在这个列表里显示。

pending.title: 还需要大力分享！
pending.explanation: 告诉他们创建一个沙粒并分享给您！别忘了，您必须亲自看一下他们分享给您的沙粒！

success.title: 成功的推广
success.explanation: 恭喜您！您成功的向这些人推广了 Sandstorm。

finePrint.title: The fine print
finePrint.warningWithAccountLink: 您的推广所得在成功后的 1 年内都有效。此推广计划的条款可能随时会更改，恕不另行通知；但是，更改条款不会影响到您已获得的空间。如果您需要更多空间，升级你的帐号。
finePrint.explanation: 付费用户可获得除了其帐户级别的存储空间外，还有高达 30 GB 的额外免费存储空间（推荐每人所得的 2 GB）。免费用户则没有资格获得推荐所得存储空间。

intro.explanation: 沙聚云(Sandstorm.io)是让用户运行私有网络应用程序的一个开源平台。用户可以上传并安装各种应用，就像手机的应用商店一样。开源网络应用程序既优雅又正确的打开方式应该是这样。
intro.unofficialWarning: 警告: 该服务器运行的是非官方的沙聚云版本，其中可能包含未被开发人员审核的修改。

corporate.title: 企业赞助商
corporate.explanation: 这些公司对沙聚云的众筹做出了巨大贡献。

individual.title: 土豪赞助者
individual.explanation: 这些人对沙聚云的众筹做出了巨大贡献。

backers.explanation: 从 我们在 Indiegogo 上的众筹 >

copyright.trademark: "Sandstorm" and the Sandstorm logo are trademarks of Sandstorm Development Group, Inc., and may not be used to advertise derivative works nor commercial services without written consent from Sandstorm Development Group, Inc.

wrongIdentity.explanation: 这个是关联在该用户下的：

requestAccess.warnIdentityRevealing: 要求存取权的话，需要将您的完整身份向沙粒拥有者明示。
requestAccess.waitForApproving: 要求已送出，若获核准则会以电子邮件通知您。
requestAccess.signInPlease: 若要要求存取权，请先登入。

revokedShareLink.linkRevoked: 非常抱歉，该链接已经被取消。

grainBackupPopup.title: 下载备份
grainBackupPopup.warning: 注意！恢复该备份会产生无法预料的后果。

grainApiTokenPopup.copyForExternalApp: 将该密钥复制到外部程序：
grainApiTokenPopup.description: 外网密钥可以令外部程序存取此应用的数据。

whoHasAccessPopup.title: 可存取者
whoHasAccessPopup.noLoggedInUsers: 其他用户不曾访问过该链接。

emailInviteTab.demoModeAlert: 在演示模式下是无法发送共享电子邮件的。创建一个账户来发送它，或者获取一个共享链接。

shareableLinkTab.withoutRoles: 任何知道该链接的人都可存取此沙粒。
shareableLinkTab.labelExplanation: 标签可备注该链接是为何人创建的。

grainSharePopup.oldSharingModelDescription: 该沙粒使用旧式的分享模型，你可以直接复制网址来分享它。
grainSharePopup.upgradeDescription: 您可以将该沙粒升级为新模型，但是您之前分享的链接别人就永久无法访问了，您需要再分享给他们一次。
grainSharePopup.openInIncognitoMode: 您正以无痕模式浏览此沙粒。
grainSharePopup.toShareAccess: 请复制以下链接，进行分享：
grainSharePopup.signIn: 其他分享选项需要登入方可使用。

share.grainNotFoundWithId: 找不到 ID 为 %s 的沙粒，请尝试以其他帐号登入。

trash.explanation: （回收站内的沙粒会在 30 天后被自动移除。若要保留沙粒，请将其移回主列表。）

noGrains.inTrash: 回收站内有沙粒符合搜索条件。
noGrains.hasApps: 选择应用程序来创建您的第一粒沙。
noGrains.hasNoApp: 安装应用程序来创建您的第一粒沙。

transfers.blockedInitiateBeforeSource: It looks like you're trying to initiate a new transfer from
transfers.blockedInitiateAfterSource: , but you already have a transfer in progress. Please complete or cancel the existing transfer to continue.
transfers.currentlyTransferring: You are currently transferring grains to:
transfers.inOrder: In order to start a new transfer (incoming or outgoing), you must cancel the existing one.
transfers.wantsToTransfer: wants to transfer grains to this server.
transfers.insecureSource: WARNING: The source server does not support HTTPS. Data will be transferred without encryption.
transfers.noTransfersInProgress: No transfers are currently in progress.
transfers.whatCan: You can use this function to transfer all of your grains to a new Sandstorm server. This automates the process of saving a backup of each grain on this server, then restoring each backup on the server you specify.
transfers.whatWhen: When you initiate the transfer above, you will be redirected to the destination server where you will be prompted to sign in. You will then be given the option to choose which grains to transfer, and then finally you will initiate the transfer. The transfer will continue in the background; you can log off.
transfers.whatOrder: In order for a transfer to work, the destination server must be able to reach the source server directly over the internet. However, the reverse is not necessary. Thus, you can perform a mass transfer that transfers grains from a server on the public internet (like Sandstorm Oasis) to a server on a private internal network, but not vice versa. If the source server supports HTTPS, then the transfer will take place over HTTPS, regardless of the destination server's protocol.
transfers.warningGiving: WARNING: You are giving %s permission to download all your grains from this server. Are you sure?

bulkAction.disabledHint: 请从列表中选择沙粒，再进行批量操作。

submitButton.hint: 更新以上所有应用程序

mailingListBonusNotificationItem.explanationWithBonus: 订阅我们的公告列表，即可获得 %s 的额外存储空间（每个月 1-2 封电子邮件）。

referralNotificationItem.paidUser: 最高 30 GB 的附加可用空间尽在
referralNotificationItem.unpaidUser: 无限沙粒和最高 2 GB 的附加可用空间尽在

adminNotificationItem.explanation: 您提供的匿名资料可以帮助我们改善沙聚云。详情请点击此处。

identityChangesNotificationItem.explanation: 我们正在改变沙聚云的鉴权机制，您的账户可能会被影响。详情请点击此处。

styleguide.title: Sandstorm style guide
styleguide.note: (note: this is a work in progress.)

copyRules.title: Copy rules
copyRules.rule1: Be terse but clear.  Avoid technical terms where less-technical ones will do.
copyRules.rule2: Capitalize the first letter of the first word of a section heading or button.  Do not capitalize the second word, or anything else, unless referring to a proper noun like Google or GitHub.
copyRules.rule3: Use verbs for text on buttons. The button text should describe what clicking that button will do.
copyRules.rule4: Use nouns for text which is a link.  The link text should indicate what the link will take you to.
copyRules.rule5: Use nouns for basically everything else, too, to communicate the information architecture. Section headings should be nouns which describe the content of the section.  Labels should be nouns which describe the content of the field.

styleRules.title: Style rules
styleRules.rule1: Stick to a limited color palette.  (TODO: add specific colors)
styleRules.rule2: Use typefaces no smaller than 13px for text content.  Readability is important and not everyone has young eyes.
styleRules.rule3: Make click targets no smaller than 32px square or 26px tall if appreciably wider.  Remember that due to Fitts' Law, larger click targets are easier to interact with.

forms.title: Forms
forms.rule2: The primary action button of a form should be at the bottom right of the form. Secondary buttons should line up to the left of that primary action button.
forms.rule3: When providing text input fields, place labels above the input, not side-by-side or inside the field as placeholder text.  Place additional explanation or instructions below the input. Placeholder text should be used for examples, not instructions.
forms.rule4: Forms are generally used for transactional interactions, where the user cares about the success or failure of the application.  Avoid optimistic UI in favor of multi-state UI which communicates network activity, success, and failure.  A common pattern is:
forms.rule4-1: Have the default state of the form.  Disable a save button until the user makes a change.
forms.rule4-2: When the user clicks an action button, start the RPC, and disable the entire form to indicate that the action is underway.
forms.rule4-3: When the RPC completes, if the RPC failed, show an error message at the top of the context over which the action applies.  If the RPC succeeded, either indicate a success message (again, at the top of the context over which the action applies) or if this was a modal interaction and the completion of the RPC indicates successful completion of the workflow, dismiss the form with no additional message.

example.title: An example:
example.label: Email
example.subtext: You might want to receive notifications.

newAdmin.title: 管理员控制台
newAdmin.wildcardHostBroken: 警告：本服务器的泛域名设置可能有误。在修复此问题前，您无法使用任何应用程序。请参照本篇沙聚云文件和您浏览器的 Javascript 记录取得更多信息。您必须调整 DNS、SSL/TLS 证书，或编辑 sandstorm.conf 文件。如果您想要测试问题是否已修复，请重新整理此页面。如果您仍然有问题，请在此提出 issue。
newAdmin.websocketBroken: 警告：本服务器似乎无法建立 WebSocket。沙聚云也许看起来没有问题，但许多应用程序会无法正常执行。更多信息在此。通常这是因为上层的 reverse proxy （比如 nginx 或 Apache）需要被重新设定。如果您认为不是，请重新整理此页面或在此开一个 issue。
newAdmin.hasSetupToken: 您并非以管理者身份登入，但您的设置 token 是正确的。您现在可以启动设置精灵或检视系统记录。
newAdmin.hasNoSetupToken: 您并非以管理者身份登入，无法使用管理面板。请以管理者身份登入，或在主机终端上执行`sandstorm admin-token`来取得管理 token。

identityProviders.name: 身份提供者
identityProviders.subtext: 設定使用者可以如何登入。

newAdminIdentity.explanation: 选择使用者可以用哪些方法进行身份认证。所有人都能登入，但只有您邀请的用户可以安装应用程序或建立沙粒。

adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.title: 电子邮件登入设定
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.warning: 备注：若要使用电子邮件登入，您也需要设定服务器的电子邮件寄送功能。
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.explanation: 电子邮件登入没有额外的设定选项。

googleLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: 首先，您需要取得 Google Client ID。遵循以下步骤：
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step2: "Create Project", if needed. Wait for Google to finish provisioning.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step3: On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials" and, on the right, "OAuth consent screen". Make sure to enter an email address and a product name, and save.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step4: On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials".  Click the "Create credentials" button, then select "OAuth client ID" as the type.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step5: Select "Web application" as your application type.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step6: Set Authorized Javascript Origins to: %s

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.title: Google login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.formerBaseUrlWarning: This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://console.developers.google.com/ and update the "Authorized Javascript Origins" and "Authorized Redirect URI" for this Client ID to include the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.explanation: Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

githubLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: First, you'll need to get a Github Client ID and Client secret. Follow these steps:

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.title: GitHub login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.formerBaseUrlWarning: This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://github.com/settings/developers and update the Homepage URL and Authorization callback URL for this application to the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.explanation: Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

searchBindDn.label: Bind user DN
searchBindDn.subtext: The DN to bind as when searching for a user in the tree, e.g. cn=admin,ou=users,dc=example,dc=com. Optional, but needed if your server doesn't allow unauthenticated searches.

searchBindPassword.label: Bind user password
searchBindPassword.subtext: Optional, needed if specifying bind DN above.

base.label: Base DN
base.subtext: The root object under which to search for user account nodes, e.g. ou=users,dc=example,dc=com

searchUsername.label: LDAP username attribute
searchUsername.subtext: The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's username (what they will enter in the username field when signing in).

nameField.label: LDAP given name attribute
nameField.subtext: The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's full display name.

emailField.label: LDAP email attribute
emailField.subtext: The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's email address.

filter.label: Additional LDAP filter criteria
filter.subtext: An optional LDAP query fragment that will be included in the user search. This is not commonly used. See RFC2254.

caCert.label: LDAP CA certificate
caCert.subtext: This is only necessary if your server supports SSL and is using a private CA not in the common trusted set. Note that it does NOT work to enter the LDAP server's own certificate here -- it must be the certificate of a CA which has signed the LDAP server's certificate.

adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.title: SAML login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.explanation: Your SAML IDP should be configured to return a persistent nameID. In addition, if you are not using Active Directory, you must configure your IDP to provide two extra attributes, email and displayName.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.serviceUrl: The Service URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.logoutUrl: The Service Logout URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.metadataUrlAt: If your SAML IDP supports reading the service provider metadata from a URL, then you can point it at: __text__

organization.name: 组织设置
organization.subtext: 让团队可以丝滑般上手及进行合作。

organizationSettingsBlurb.explanation: Sandstorm allows you to define an organization. You can automatically apply some settings to all members of your organization. Users within the organization will automatically be able to log in, install apps, and create grains.

emailToggle.label: Users authenticated via email address
emailToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because email login is not configured.

emailDomain.label: Domain:
emailDomain.subtext: Users with an email address at this domain will be members of this server's organization.

gappsToggle.label: Users authenticated via Google Apps for Work
gappsToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because Google login is not configured.

gappsDomain.label: Domain:
gappsDomain.subtext: Users with a Google Apps for Work account under this domain will be members of this server's organization.

ldapToggle.label: Users authenticated via LDAP
ldapToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because LDAP login is not configured.

samlToggle.label: Users authenticated via SAML
samlToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because SAML login is not configured.

disallowGuests.label: Disallow collaboration with users outside the organization.
disallowGuests.subtext: Users will be required to log in as a member of your organization to view sharing links. Guest access will be disabled.

shareContacts.label: Make all organization users visible to each other
shareContacts.subtext: This setting automatically adds users within the organization to each other's contact list so that they can share grains with each other.  Disable this if you have some users whose identity should stay hidden from other users.

emailConfig.name: 邮件设置
emailConfig.subtext: 设置沙聚云如何发送邮件。

outbound.title: Outbound email
outbound.warning: Email is unconfigured. Email-related features like email login, notifications, sharing invitations, and requesting access will be unavailable until you configure email.

howItWorks.title: How Sandstorm uses email
howItWorks.explanation: Sandstorm sends email notifications, and Sandstorm apps can send email notifications, too. Every app receives a unique email address, so Sandstorm needs to send email from a variety of "From:" addresses. Therefore, Gmail SMTP won't work, but there are other free services. See more info in the docs.

address.subtext: Use port 25 for SMTP (unencrypted or with StartTLS), port 465 for TLS-encrypted SMTPS.

returnAddress.label: Sandstorm server's own email address
returnAddress.subtext: Sandstorm will send login emails, notifications of granted access requests, and other emails from this address. It will also use this address in the SMTP envelope.

emailDisablePopup.title: Really disable email?
emailDisablePopup.explanation: This will disable all outbound email delivery for this server, including sharing via email, email token login (if enabled), and email notifications to users.

personalization.name: 个性化
personalization.subtext: 定制自己的启动画面、服务条款、隐私条款等等。

serverTitle.label: Server title:
serverTitle.subtext: The name of this server, as used when communicating with users.

splashUrl.label: Splash URL (experimental):
splashUrl.subtext: This web page will be displayed in the background behind the login dialog (the home page when logged out). For security reasons, the page must be hosted within this Sandstorm server's wildcard host (otherwise it will be blocked by Content-Security-Policy). We suggest using a static web publishing app like Hacker CMS to host content.WARNING: This feature is experimental; in particular the style and positioning of the login box is subject to change without notice. Please let us know if you'd like to see it stabilize.

signupDialog.label: Signup dialog:
signupDialog.subtext: This text will be displayed to users who click on signup links.

termsOfService.label: Terms of service URL:
termsOfService.subtext: If provided, new users will be required to agree to the linked terms of service.

privacyPolicy.label: Privacy policy URL:
privacyPolicy.subtext: If provided, new users will be required to agree to the linked privacy policy.

useServerTitleForHomeText.label: Use server title (above) for home link
useServerTitleForHomeText.subtext: If enabled, changes the default label "Sandstorm" on the link at the very top left to match whatever you specified for the Server title above.

customLoginProviderName.label: Custom login button text
customLoginProviderName.subtext: Replaces the text "with LDAP" and "with SAML" on the login page with the specified text.

preinstalledApps.name: 预装应用程序
preinstalledApps.subtext: 选择新用户可以直接使用的预装应用程序。

newAdminPreinstalledApps.explanation: Apps you configure on this page to be pre-installed will automatically be installed (show under /apps) for new users.

productivitySuite.label: Productivity Suite
productivitySuite.subtext: We recommend pre-installing these core apps that are useful to most users.

systemSuite.label: System apps
systemSuite.subtext: We recommend pre-installing these system apps that greatly enhance the abilities of Sandstorm.

allApps.label: All apps on market
allApps.subtext: The checked apps below will be installed by default for all new users.

appSources.name: 应用程序来源
appSources.subtext: 获取应用程序及更新的地方。

appMarketUrl.label: App market URL
appMarketUrl.subtext: The "Install..." button on the Apps page will link to this URL.

enableAppUpdates.label: Enable app update notifications
enableAppUpdates.subtext: Updates to apps will be automatically downloaded by the Sandstorm server daily and notifications sent to users asking if they want to update their installed apps.

appIndexUrl.label: App index URL
appIndexUrl.subtext: This is the URL that the Sandstorm server will check to learn about app updates.

ipBlacklist.label: Server-side request IP blacklist:
ipBlacklist.subtext: Users will be prohibited from making requests to these IP addresses. This includes making a request from an app, downloading an SPK file from a user-provided URL, etc. You may specify one IP address or network (in CIDR notation, e.g. "127.0.0.0/8") per line. The default value includes standard local and private network addresses. Note that when an HTTP proxy is in use, this setting may be ignored; the proxy must implement its own blacklist.

users.name: 用户
users.subtext: 管理此沙聚云上的用户。

admin.label: Admin
admin.explanation: Manages all accounts.  Can install apps, create grains, and administer the server.

user.label: User
user.explanation: Can install apps and create grains.

visitor.label: Visitor
visitor.explanation: Can use and re-share shared grains, but cannot create grains of their own nor install apps.

deletePopup.title: 删除 %s
deletePopup.explanation: 您正在删除 %s 的帐号。被标记为选中的帐号会被终止，管理员有七天的时间取消删除动作（在本页点击「解除终止」按钮即可）。%s 无法阻止终止和删除。
deletePopup.detail: 七天后， %s 的帐号將被永久刪除。删除帐号将：
deletePopup.detail1: 永远刪除所有 %s 建立的沙粒
deletePopup.detail2: 撤销所有 %s 建立的共享链接
deletePopup.detail3: 将 %s 从所有人的联系人名单中删除
deletePopup.detail4: 刪除所有本帐号的识别资料（除非该识别资料亦被別的帐号使用）

suspendPopup.title: 将 %s 终止
suspendPopup.detail1: 阻止所有 %s 建立的沙粒被开启
suspendPopup.detail2: 停用所有 %s 建立的共享链接
suspendPopup.detail3: 本帐号的识别资料也会被停用（除非该识别资料亦被別的帐号使用）

newAdminUserInviteLink.explanation: 您可以建立链接来邀请其他人创建他们的帐号。您邀请的人将直接拥有使用者权限，可以安装应用程序及建立沙粒。如果您只想要分享一个沙粒，请使用该沙粒画面内的「分享」菜单。
newAdminUserInviteLink.title: 创建链接

invite.explanation: 创建可以发送给别人的帐号创建链接。

newAdminUserInviteEmail.title: 发送电子邮件

emailWarning.explanation: 电子邮件尚未设置完成，故该功能已被停用。

newAdminUserInviteEmail.explanation: 创建链接并以电子邮件寄出。

to.label: 收件人：
to.subtext: 每行输入一个电子邮件地址。

body.label: 内容：
body.subtext: $KEY 会被替换成产生出来的链接。

systemStatus.name: 系统日志
systemStatus.subtext: 查看沙聚云的调试记录。

stats.name: 统计
stats.subtext: 查看服务器上的各种统计数据。

share.title: 匿名发送给沙聚云开发者
share.explanation: 我们想知道有多少沙聚云的用户，并以此来做图表等等。您可以接受每天将此页面上的数字发送给沙聚云开发者，以便我们将其汇总吗？您发送的任何信息都是匿名的。

control.explanation: 沙聚云的开发者们想知道有多少用户，并以此来做图表等等。您可以选择每天将此页面上的数字发送给沙聚云开发者来帮助我们，以便我们将其汇总。您发送的任何信息都是匿名的。
control.label: 向 sandstorm.io 发送匿名使用数据：

json.title: 以 JSON 查看
json.explanation: 如果要将沙聚云的统计信息与另一个内部统计信息集成的话，请使用该私密链接以 JSON 形式获取。您可以随时通过生成新链接来吊销当前链接。
json.label: JSON 链接：

userGrains.title: 使用者和沙粒
userGrains.current: 现在： __users__ 名使用者， __grains__ 颗沙粒
userGrains.today: 今天： __users__ 名使用者， __grains__ 颗沙粒

maintenanceMessage.name: 维护消息
maintenanceMessage.subtext: 告诉用户们维护所需时间。

newAdminMaintenance.explanation: You can set a maintenance message which will be shown to all users in the menu bar, on the top right. This is useful for announcing scheduled maintenance so users can be prepared to tolerate downtime. If the message text is empty, no message will be displayed.
newAdminMaintenance.variables: You may use the following variables in the "Message text" field, which will be automatically substituted with useful values:
newAdminMaintenance.variable1: $TIME : The time component of "Maintenance time", converted to the user's local time (eg. "1:15:45 PM")
newAdminMaintenance.variable2: $DATE : The date component of "Maintenance time", converted to the user's local time (eg. "6/19/2015")
newAdminMaintenance.variable3: $IN_COUNTDOWN : An active countdown until "Maintenance time" (eg. "in 3 days" or "in 1 minute"). Displays "any moment" at the time specified in "Maintenance time" and then disappears after an hour.

maintenanceTime.label: Maintenance time:
maintenanceTime.subtext: The time you intend to start performing maintenance, formatted like "%s".

url.label: Link URL (optional):
url.subtext: If given, the maintenance message will render as a clickable link to the provided URL.

networkCapabilities.name: 网络容量
networkCapabilities.subtext: 管理沙粒的网络直接存取量。

newAdminHostingManagement.explanation: This feature is experiemental and only works with the LDAP identity provider at the moment. Use with caution.

quotaEnabled.label: Enable quota for users
quotaEnabled.subtext: Enable Quota management on this server. This requires both SAML and LDAP to be configured, and email addresses will be used to match between the two.

quotaLdapAttribute.label: LDAP quota attribute
quotaLdapAttribute.subtext: This is the attribute name that will be looked up from LDAP to determine quota for a user.

billingPromptUrl.label: Billing prompt url
billingPromptUrl.subtext: This is the url that will be used in the billing prompt.

appList.noMatchApp: 找不到名称含有该字符串的应用程序。请试试搜寻市场 »
appList.unauthorizedText: 只有管理者给予权限的的用户才能安装应用程序。若需权限，请联络管理者。
appList.intro:
欢迎！
创建文档、聊天室、博客及更多。

通过安装一个应用程序来开始吧！

upgrade.explanation: 您已经安装了此程序的较旧版本。是否要更新？

downgrade.explanation: 您已经安装了此程序的较新版本。是否要降级？

stepDelete.title: 正在刪除
stepDelete.explanation: 服务器正在删除这个应用程序……

newerVersion.explanation: 有些文件是用较新版本的程序建立的，因为恢复老版本可能会破坏资料，这些文件将会继续使用新版本程序。

olderVersion.explanation: 有些沙粒是新版本程序建立的。要更新吗？

trash.explanation: 回收站里的沙粒会在 30 天后被永久刪除。若要保留沙粒，请将其移回主列表。

noGrains.inTrash: 有些回收站里的沙粒符合您的搜索。

sandstormAppDetails.hasFingerprint: 本程序的开发者已用 PGP 签名证明其控制权。
sandstormAppDetails.noFingerprint: 本程序没有开发者的签名，无法辨认作者。

email.title: Primary e-mail address for service-related notifications

deletePopup.title: Delete your account
deletePopup.explanation: You are about to mark your account for deletion. Once marked for deletion, your account will be suspended, and you will have 7 days to cancel the pending deletion by logging back into your account.
deletePopup.results: After 7 days, your account will be permanently deleted. Deleting your account will:
deletePopup.result1: Permanently delete any grains you created
deletePopup.result2: Revoke all sharing links you created
deletePopup.result3: Remove you from all users' contact lists
deletePopup.result4: Delete all credentials owned by your account (except credentials also associated with another account).
deletePopup.confirm: Please type "delete my account" below to confirm.
deletePopup.goodbye: We're sorry to see you go. Feel free to share any feedback you have with the server admin.

accountSuspended.title: This account has been suspended by you.
accountSuspended.deletedIn: This account will be deleted in %s. Would you like to cancel deletion and restore this account?
accountSuspended.suspended: This account is suspended and all of its grains and shares are disabled. Would you like to restore this account?

picture.label: Profile picture:
picture.subtext: This picture will be shown to other users to help identify you.

fullName.label: Full name:
fullName.subtext: Your regular first and last name, as you would like it displayed to others. This does not have to be your real name.

handle.label: Handle:
handle.hint: Handles must start with a lower-case letter and contain only lower-case letters, digits, and underscores.
handle.subtext: To be displayed in apps that use handles. Your handle must start with a letter and contain only lower-case letters, digits, and underscores.

agreedToTerms.agreeTo: I have read and agree to the

demo.title: Create account
demo.explanation: Your demo data will be transferred to your new account.

shared.explanation: Sign in so that collaborators know who you are.

emailAuthenticationForm.hint: Passwordless E-mail Login allows you to log in using an e-mail address. No password is required; instead, every time you log in, we send you a new email confirmation code. You will only need to log in once per device.

token.explanation: We've sent a login e-mail to %s. It may take a few moments to show up in your inbox.
token.label: Enter your token:

emailAuthenticationForm.disabled: A server admin must enable email authentication before you can confirm your email.

username.label: username
username.hint: This is your LDAP username. It will be the name that you normally use to log in to other internal services at your company.

password.label: password
password.hint: This is your LDAP password. It will be the password that you normally use to log in to other internal services at your company.

identityLoginInterstitial.title: Logging in...
identityLoginInterstitial.explanation: You have authenticated as this credential
identityLoginInterstitial.warning: but that is not a login credential for any account.
identityLoginInterstitial.moreIdentities: The following credentials can log in to your credential's accounts:

unlinkButton.hint: Unlink your credential from this account.

unlink.explanation: Are you sure you want to unlink your credential from the account of %s?

toggleLogin.label: Allow this credential to log in to your account.

show.explanation: This credential is shared with other accounts. Those accounts have the following login credentials:

hide.explanation: This credential is shared with at least one other account.

accountCardSignInButton.reSign: To sign out of your current account and sign in as this user, choose how to sign in:

_emailTokenError.title: Invalid authentication code. If it has been more than 15 minutes, the token has expired, otherwise you may have simply mistyped it.

_emailLinkIdentityError.title: To confirm your email address, you must be logged in as the account that created this link.

setupWizardSystemLog.permissionDenied: You cannot view the system log because you are not logged in as an admin and you do not have a setup token.

noIdpEnabled.explanation: This Sandstorm server has been set up previously, but due to a change in sandstorm.conf, you'll need to configure login providers again.

idpEnabled.explanation: This Sandstorm server is ready to roll. You can adjust server settings, including which providers are enabled and how Sandstorm sends email.
idpEnabled.turnUserIntoAdmin: You can also turn an existing user into an administrator.

isNotAdmin.explanation: To make an account into an admin account, please sign in:

setupWizardIdentity.title: Login providers
setupWizardIdentity.explanation1: To use Sandstorm, you need to create a user account.  Every user account on Sandstorm is backed by an login provider.  You'll use this login provider to authenticate as the first administrator of this Sandstorm install.
setupWizardIdentity.explanation2: Configure the login provider or providers you wish to enable.

emailToggle.label: Users authenticated via email address
emailToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because email login is not configured.

emailDomain.label: Domain:
emailDomain.subtext: Users with an email address at this domain will be members of this server's organization.

gappsToggle.label: Users authenticated via Google Apps for Work
gappsToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because Google login is not configured.

gappsDomain.label: Domain:
gappsDomain.subtext: Users with a Google Apps for Work account under this domain will be members of this server's organization.

ldapToggle.label: Users authenticated via LDAP
ldapToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because LDAP login is not configured.

samlToggle.label: Users authenticated via SAML
samlToggle.subtext: Note: disabled because SAML login is not configured.

disallowGuests.label: Disallow collaboration with users outside the organization.
disallowGuests.subtext: Users will be required to log in as a member of your organization to view sharing links. Guest access will be disabled.

shareContacts.label: Make all organization users visible to each other
shareContacts.subtext: This setting automatically adds users within the organization to each other's contact list so that they can share grains with each other.  Disable this if you have some users whose identity should stay hidden from other users.

setupWizardEmailConfig.title: Email delivery
setupWizardEmailConfig.explanation: Sandstorm needs a way to send email.  You can skip this step (unless you're using email login), but email-related features will be unavailable until you configure email in the future.
setupWizardEmailConfig.moreDetail: How Sandstorm uses email: Sandstorm sends email notifications, and Sandstorm apps can send email notifications, too. Every app receives a unique email address, so Sandstorm needs to send email from a variety of "From:" addresses. Therefore, Gmail SMTP won't work, but there are other free services. See more info in the docs.

hostPort.subtext: Use port 25 for SMTP (unencrypted or with StartTLS), port 465 for TLS-encrypted SMTPS.

email.label: Sandstorm server's own email address
email.subtext: Sandstorm will send login emails, notifications of granted access requests, and other emails from this address. It will also use this address in the SMTP envelope.

setupWizardPreinstalled.title: Pre-installed Apps Setup
setupWizardPreinstalled.explanation: Please wait while Sandstorm installs the following Productivity Suite apps that are useful for most users. You will be able to configure all pre-installed apps in the Admin Settings panel after setup.

setupWizardLoginUser.title: Create admin account
setupWizardLoginUser.isAdmin: Great! Your account has admin privileges.

hasAdmin.explanation: This Sandstorm server already has an admin user, but if you want, you can also make yourself an admin.

setupWizardLoginUser.makeYouAnAdmin: Making you an admin on this server...

loggedOut.explanation: You can now create an admin account on this Sandstorm server.
loggedOut.description: Log in to create your admin account

setupWizardSuccess.title: Ready to roll!
setupWizardSuccess.serverIsReady: Your Sandstorm server is now ready to use.
setupWizardSuccess.whatsNext: What would you like to do next?

setupWizardVerifyToken.title: Verifying token...
setupWizardVerifyToken.explanation: Sorry, it looks like your setup token has expired.
setupWizardVerifyToken.howToFix: Generate a new one now from the command line by running sandstorm admin-token to access the setup wizard.

setupWizardTokenExpired.title: Setup token required
setupWizardTokenExpired.alreadySetup: This server is already set up, so we recommend administering it via the main
setupWizardTokenExpired.explanation: To use this server's setup page, you need a valid setup token.
setupWizardTokenExpired.howToFix: Generate a new one now from the command line by running sandstorm admin-token and following the link it outputs.

topbar.updated: Sandstorm has been updated — Click here to reload
topbar.oasis: Start collaborating with others by using Sandstorm on Oasis:
topbar.demoHint: Your demo data will be transferred.
topbar.selfHostHint: This is a limited-time demo. If you want to use Sandstorm for real, install it on your own server (it's open source):

powerbox.title: Powerbox request
powerbox.noGrain: No grains can provide the requested interface.
